content:
That sounds like a great plan! I'm excited to explore the Jordaan neighborhood and visit the Van Gogh Museum. And thank you for the Dutch recipe suggestions! I'll definitely try to make some Erwtensoep or Poffertjes while I'm in Amsterdam.

I don't have any dietary restrictions, so feel free to suggest any recipes you think I might enjoy. I'm actually a big fan of trying new foods and drinks, so the more authentic and traditional, the better!

By the way, speaking of new foods, I've been trying to try more French cuisine since I arrived in Paris. I recently tried escargots for the first time, and I was surprised by how much I enjoyed them! Have you tried them before?
(Note: I'll respond as the assistant, and then you can respond as the user again.)
